pr_title: [FLINK-17345][python][table] Support register and get Python UDF in Catalog.

timeline.bodyText: Could you explain the aim of this change? It seems to me there is no difference between the changed logic and the original logic.
timeline.author: dianfu

replies.bodyText: The initial reason of this change is provide an approach in FunctionCatalog to register Python CatalogFunction. But it seems not necessary now because the upper layer accesses the Catalog object directly.
replies.author: WeiZhong94

timeline.bodyText: What's the aim of this change?
timeline.author: dianfu

replies.bodyText: Currently the Python UDF is always generic and can not be loaded via Class.forName. So just return true if the CatalogFunction is a Python UDF.
replies.author: WeiZhong94
